Morph Demos

A solid-color overlay morphs away via clip-path to reveal content underneath.

↓ Scroll down ↓

Circle Morph

The dark overlay from the section above shrinks away in a circle.

morph="circle"

Inset Morph

The light overlay contracts from all edges, revealing the dark section.

morph="inset"

Polygon Morph

The overlay morphs into a diamond shape, revealing the red section.

morph="polygon"

Slow Circle Morph

Same circle morph, but with pace="slow" for a wider scroll range.

morph="circle" pace="slow"

Inset Morph + Exit

Scroll back up — the overlay returns. Uses pace="exit".

morph="inset" pace="exit"

Circle Morph + Spring Easing

Custom easing with easing="ease-spring-3".

morph="circle" easing="ease-spring-3"

Morph + Animate Self

Content fades up while the overlay morphs away.

morph="polygon" animate-self="fade-up()"
